name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: Made using Indian masalas and Basmati rice. Barbequed pieces of Chicken were added. Indulge in the aromatic bliss of our Chicken Fried Rice, where succulent pieces of chicken are gently simmered with fragrant spices, layered with fluffy basmati rice, and garnished to perfection. A culinary journey that will leave your taste buds craving for more!

name: Veg Fried Rice
description: Made using Indian masalas and Basmati rice. Experience the ultimate comfort food with our Veg Fried Rice, a delightful medley of colorful vegetables stir-fried to perfection and tossed with fragrant rice. It's a symphony of flavors that will brighten your day!

name: Fish Biryani
description: Dive into a seafood lover's paradise with our Fish Biryani, where succulent fish fillets are marinated in aromatic spices and lovingly layered with fragrant basmati rice. A culinary masterpiece that's a true catch!

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Our Chicken Biryani is a culinary masterpiece that combines the richness of tender chicken pieces, aromatic basmati rice, and a medley of hand-picked spices. Dive into a plate of sheer delight and discover why it's a beloved classic.

name: Veg Biryani
description: Our Veg Biryani is a culinary masterpiece, featuring a vibrant mix of garden-fresh vegetables and the perfect blend of spices, all lovingly layered with fluffy rice. A symphony of flavors that satisfies both heart and palate.

name: Prawns Fried Rice
description: Treat your taste buds to a seafood sensation with our Prawn Fried Rice, a symphony of plump prawns wok-tossed with aromatic rice and a hint of savory perfection. It's a flavor-packed adventure in every bite!

name: Chilli Paneer
description: Spice up your day with our delectable Chilli Paneer, where cubes of creamy paneer are stir-fried to perfection in a tantalizing blend of spices and bell peppers. It's a fiery flavor explosion you won't want to miss!

name: Paneer 65
description: Experience the ultimate appetizer with our Paneer 65, where bite-sized pieces of paneer are marinated in a fiery blend of spices, deep-fried to perfection, and served with a tangy twist. It's a spicy sensation that's impossible to resist!

name: Chicken Tikka
description: Savor the smoky goodness of our Chicken Tikka, where succulent pieces of chicken are marinated in a blend of aromatic spices, skewered, and grilled to perfection. It's a classic Indian dish that's a true crowd-pleaser!

name: Paneer Tikka
description: Delight in the vegetarian masterpiece that is Paneer Tikka, where soft cubes of paneer are marinated in a fragrant blend of spices, skewered, and charred to perfection. It's a flavor-packed treat that's loved by all!

name: Chicken Cheese Pizza
description: Indulge in the irresistible goodness of our Chicken and Cheese Pizza, where tender pieces of savory chicken are generously scattered over a bed of gooey, melted cheese, all on a crispy, golden crust. It's a pizza lover's dream come true, delivering the perfect fusion of flavors in every slice!

name: Mix Veg Pizza
description: Experience a burst of vibrant flavors with our Mix Veg Pizza, featuring a medley of fresh, colorful vegetables such as bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and more, generously layered over a bed of melting cheese and a perfectly baked crust. It's a wholesome delight that satisfies both your taste buds and your appetite!
